p: For human influenza B, positions 42, 65, 248, 345, 373, 389, 395, and 436 were found to be under positive selection ( Table 3). The crystal structure of the B/Perth/211/2011 virus NA region with zanamivir, oseltamivir, or peramivir showed that residues 373 and 374 participated in drug binding, while residue 345 is involved in calcium binding and dimerization of two NA monomers ( Figure 5-C, D).
